meta.description: Get more at http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Neil Miller talks about what went into his research into vaccine studies. He's published a book that helps clarify vaccine studies that are available to anyone. Learn why he went into this research and what he did with his own kids after learning what he did!

title: Researching Truth About Vaccines For You!
cleaned_text:
Get more at http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter

Neil Miller talks about what went into his research into vaccine studies. He's published a book that helps clarify vaccine studies that are available to anyone. Learn why he went into this research and what he did with his own kids after learning what he did!
